snippet: Commissioner Roger Goodell’s soon-to-be-announced decision on the discipline appeals by the New Orleans Saints offers a chance to send a message about the primacy of player safety.
abstract: Judy Battista On Football column asserts that NFL commissioner Roger Goodell’s decision on the discipline appeals by the New Orleans Saints offers a chance to send a message about the primacy of player safety.
lead_paragraph: Commissioner Roger Goodell’s soon-to-be-announced decision on the discipline appeals by the New Orleans Saints offers a chance to send a message about the primacy of player safety.

headline.seo: Decision on Appeals in N.F.L. Bounty Case Could Come Monday
headline.main: Ruling on Bounty Appeals Will Be Signal to the Public
headline.print_headline: Ruling on Bounty Appeals Will Be a Signal to the Public
